title: What major events happened in 1879? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Major events” depend on where you live in the world. Today’s world is small, with information about events almost immediately via internet etc. Binding the world together. Albert Einstein was bornEdison’s light bulb proved to be successful. The first electric arc light lit some streets in CaliforniaAnglo-Zulu war began in Southern Africa when a British force invaded Zululand. The natives there with their chief put up an unexpected hard resistance, but were without chance because they had no fire arms.A war between Chile and Bolivia/Peru was started and went on through the year. Chile was victorous. Bolivia lost districts, and became a country with no shores.Longest championship fight ever. 136 rounds.Afghan state established. It was to separate Russia and the English, in order to save peace.Ferdinand de Lesseps formed French Panama Canal Company.Hearing aid (audiophone) invented.Germany and Austrian-Hungary signed a joint contract that said if one of them was attacked, the other country was to give military help.
